title: Vallejo Design System - Shadow Tokens
description: Drop shadow definitions for elevation and depth, extracted from Dropshadows component

dark.name: Drop Shadow Dark
dark.description: Drop shadow for things higher off the page
dark.usage: Elevated elements, cards higher on the page, modals

medium.name: Drop Shadow Medium
medium.description: Drop shadow for things in the middle
medium.usage: Standard elevation, cards, buttons with elevation

light.name: Drop Shadow Light
light.description: Drop shadow for things lower on the page
light.usage: Subtle elevation, input fields, subtle depth

notes.extraction: Shadows extracted from Dropshadows component (node-id: 755-588) in Figma
notes.organization: Organized by elevation level: dark (highest), medium, light (lowest)
notes.cssVariables: All shadows have corresponding CSS variables following the pattern: --shadow-{level}
notes.usage: Use shadow tokens to create visual hierarchy and depth. Dark for highest elevation, light for subtle depth.
notes.colorFormat: Shadow colors are in RGBA format with alpha transparency
